price: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, ndetse bakanicisha bugufi kuri Nyagasani wabo; bazaba mu Ijuru ubuziraherezo.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَخۡبَتُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wa-akhbatū ilā rabbihim ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
